reasoning: Soft tissue sarcomas (STS) global incidence ~3 per 100k per year. Well-documented cancer registry data from GLOBOCAN 2005. Includes leiomyosarcoma, liposarcoma, fibrosarcoma, synovial sarcoma, and other histological subtypes. Incidence varies by age and anatomical site.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
